meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding on ocean waves on a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: I love watching surfing competitions on TV.
meanings.sent2: She tried surfing for the first time during her vacation.
meanings.sent3: The surfing instructor made learning to balance on the board look easy.
meanings.sent4: His movements on the waves were as graceful as a dancer.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crashing waves filled the air as the surfers rode the waves.

meanings.definition: Browsing the internet in search of information.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy surfing the web for new recipes.
meanings.sent2: He spends hours surfing online for the latest news updates.
meanings.sent3: She was caught surfing the internet during work hours.
meanings.sent4: Surfing through websites, he found the answer he was looking for.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of discovery while surfing the net is exciting.
